about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Developer
about.description: Developer passionate about computer science and digital technologies, I am equally interested in programming and understanding the systems that underpin it. Curious and rigorous, I enjoy designing concrete projects, learning new technologies and optimizing my solutions. My goal is to continue to progress technically while developing a solid and thoughtful vision of software development.

job1.title: Software Developer
job1.description: Created my software development micro-business. Development of websites, applications and custom solutions for clients.

edu1.description: 3-year program in software development. Learning modern technologies, project management and application development.

edu2.title: High School Diploma with Honors
edu2.description: Obtained high school diploma with honors. Specialties in Computer Science (NSI) and Mathematics.
